mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.name shopname, a.amount, a.createtime FROM wh_order a, wh_shop b WHERE a.shopid = b.id AND a.userid = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.id limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pagesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(1) FROM wh_order a, wh_shop b WHERE a.shopid = b.id AND a.userid = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id orderid, a.userid, d.name username, CONCAT((SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.province), (SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.city), (SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.street), c.fulladdress) fulladdress, d.phonenum telphone, a.amount FROM wh_order a LEFT JOIN wh_shipping_address c ON a.addressid = c.id LEFT JOIN wh_shop b ON a.shopid = b.id LEFT JOIN wh_user d ON a.userid = d.id WHERE a.shopid = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = 1 ORDER BY a.id limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pagesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(1) FROM wh_order a LEFT JOIN wh_shipping_address c ON a.addressid = c.id LEFT JOIN wh_shop b ON a.userid = b.id WHERE a.shopid = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = 1

SELECT a.userid,b.name username,CONCAT((SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.province), (SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.city), (SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.street), c.fulladdress) fulladdress,b.phonenum,a.id orderid,a.createtime,a.amount,a.express,a.trackingnum FROM wh_order a, wh_user b, wh_shipping_address c WHERE a.userid = b.id and a.addressid = c.id AND a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT a.num,b.id productid,b.name productname,b.price,b.picture,b.title FROM wh_order_details a, wh_product b WHERE a.productid = b.id AND a.orderid = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select AUTO_INCREMENT id from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME='wh_order'
select sum(a.price * b.num) from wh_product a,wh_order_details b where a.id = b.productid and b.orderid = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id orderid, e.picture picture, e.name productname, c.name username, c.telphone, CONCAT((SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.province), (SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.city), (SELECT name FROM wh_city WHERE code = c.street), c.fulladdress) fulladdress, a.amount FROM wh_order a LEFT JOIN wh_shipping_address c ON a.addressid = c.id LEFT JOIN wh_shop b ON a.userid = b.id LEFT JOIN wh_order_details d ON a.id = d.orderid LEFT JOIN wh_product e ON d.productid = e.id where a.userid = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.id order by a.id desc limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pagesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
